topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A new cybercrime tool named ErrTraffic has been identified, allowing threat actors to automate ClickFix attacks by generating fake browser glitches on compromised websites to deliver malicious payloads.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3mbab3xcveq2z

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Trust Wallet has begun compensating users affected by a security exploit targeting its Chrome browser extension.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28378778/Trust-Wallet-Compensates-Users-After-Chrome-Extension-Exploit

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Unleash Protocol halted all on-chain activities following a multisig exploit and governance failure that led to a hack. Reports indicate the incident is part of a growing trend of DeFi-related scams.
Sources:
- https://u.today/scam-alert-unleash-protocol-faces-multisig-exploit
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28370507/How-a-governance-failure-led-to-the-Unleash-Protocol-hack

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The threat actor Silver Fox has shifted active phishing operations toward India, utilizing income tax lures to deploy the modular ValleyRAT. The attack leverages DLL sideloading in legitimate Windows software to gain persistent access for credential theft.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/209811713/status/2005954151034019860
